topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5577d67763687241d4001f07#post_5577d67763687241d4001f07
It's also why cultural communism is a failure.

The second your culture opens up to the outside poof goes your ideals.


Pretty much the only successful 100% communist country in the world is North Korea; I'm pretty sure nobody wants to live in North Korea, not even North Koreans.
